lines.text: José, it's not fair, Laura, it's not fair. He died for nothing. Everything will stay the same. I mean... I knew José for a long time, long time ago. I had a Gaucho friend, a truck driver, and José killed him. Not sure if on purpose but he did it. He got out of the army, and so did I. Out there. We didn't looked for each other all that much but we've met now. Not long ago... at the construction work. And then all of this happen. We were soldiers together. A long time ago. We were young, you know? Free from everything. We've been through a lot together, we were... friends. I don't know. It was a long time ago. As if I'd die tomorrow and everything would the same, Laura, as if I never existed. This can't die like this, you know? It's not fair. Oh God...
